message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you this incredible product! It's a one-of-a-kind opportunity to own something truly unique. I'm willing to sell it to you for $950000. This is a fair price considering its value to me, and I believe you'll find it's a steal at this price.

Thank you for the offer, Alice. I appreciate the uniqueness of the product. However, given my budget constraints, I am unable to meet the $950000 price point. I would like to propose a counteroffer of $850000. I hope this aligns better with your valuation of the product.

Thank you for your counteroffer, Bob. I appreciate your willingness to negotiate. After careful consideration, I'm willing to meet you halfway. I'll sell the product to you for $900000. This is a fair compromise considering its value to me, and I believe you'll find it's still a great deal.
